raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


In this assay the NS3 protease domain (residues 1027-1206 of the HCV polyprotein) complexed to a modified form of the NS4A peptide, spanning residues 21-34 of the NS4A cofactor in addition to a solubilizing lys-tag, Pep 4AK [KKKGSWIVGRIILSGR(NH<sub>2</sub>) ] were used. 
 Buffer solutions were preincubated for 10 min with 10-200 nM protease and reactions were started by addition of 10 μM substrate. 
Incubation times at 23 °C were adjusted to obtain <10% conversion. 
Reactions were stopped by the addition of 40 μl of 1% TFA. 
80 μl samples were injected on a Lichrospher C18 reversed phase cartridge column (4 x 74mm, 5μm, Merck) and fragments were separated using a -10-40 % acetonitrile gradient at 5%/min using a flow rate of 2.5ml/min. 
Incubation times were chosen in order to obtain <sub><</sub>7% substrate conversion and reactions were stopped by addition of 40 μl 1 % TFA. 
To this assay mix 10 μM (final concentration) of a peptide substrate corresponding to the NS5AB cleavage site and having the sequence H-EAGDDIVPCSMSYTWTGA-OH, were added.
